body_html:
We're not using flake8 yet, and I don't think we want to merge this until we get a handle on the configuration we want to use for it. A related issue: #217

It'll otherwise give too many warnings besides the indentation that would make it pretty useless.

Note: we do run pylint with this config:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pylintrc

body:
We're not using flake8 yet, and I don't think we want to merge this until we get a handle on the configuration we want to use for it. A related issue: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/217

It'll otherwise give too many warnings besides the indentation that would make it pretty useless.

Note: we do run pylint with this config:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pylintrc
